name: Ski Free or Die Hard
description:
This project was created in two weeks for the PIGSquad Summer Slow Jams game jam event. The jam theme was to remix an existing game and we settled on SkiFree. Ski and shoot your way across three stages to, ya know, be free!

*Submission build has a very minor bug at the end. Newest build, well, doesn't!

*Mac people: Your directions are...Not for the faint of heart. See below.

1. Download / decompress file. Try to open it. You probably don't have permission.

2. Open Terminal. Type the following: sudo chmod -R 755

3. Drag the decompressed file in Terminal to create a filepath and hit enter.

4. You may be prompted for your password. Enter it.

5. On a new line, type: sudo xattr -dr com.apple.quarantine

6. Again, drag the game file into Terminal to create a path. Hit enter.

You should be able to open after that. Sorry. This is an ongoing issue between Unity and Big Sur that should've been fixed by now...
